article_title: Rep. Westmoreland to retire at end of year
article_text:
03:30 Father of Charlie Artis remembers his son during sentencing hearing Pause

03:16 Murder victim's sister testifies about "heartless act" that took her brother

01:16 Judge sentences men convicted in Charlie Artis murder

00:47 Jury delivers guilty verdict in murder trial

04:39 Lead prosecutor to jury: "Ladies and gentleman, this is the murder weapon"

00:37 Update: Trial continues this morning in barber's homicide

01:15 On being homeless: It takes time to get off the streets

01:36 Columbus motorcyclists ride so homeless can walk in new shoes

02:17 Attorney for defendant in barber's homicide says state is going after the wrong man

02:14 Trial in barber's homicide: Defense attorney for Doleman claims fourth man identified only as "Chris" is the shooter

article_metadata.description: U.S. Rep. Lynn Westmoreland, who represents north Columbus in the 3rd Congressional District, announced Thursday that he won't seek re-election this year after six terms in office.
article_metadata.title: Rep. Westmoreland to retire at end of year | Columbus Ledger-Enquirer

og.description: U.S. Rep. Lynn Westmoreland, who represents north Columbus in the 3rd Congressional District, announced Thursday that he won't seek re-election this year after six terms in office.
